text: Khabi, also rendered Kabie (from ), is a Southern Loloish language of Yunnan, China. Kabie is spoken in Jiangcheng Hani and Yi Autonomous County, Mojiang Hani Autonomous County, and Lüchun County. Khabi word lists transcribed using the Roman-based Hani orthography are provided in Minta (2013) and Luo & Minta (2016). ==Distribution== Kabie (Khabi) is spoken in:Hsiu, Andrew. 2017. Khabi audio word list.
